channel.title: Need more help on my server!
channel.description:
I need more help on my server and I'm starting to get p-oed! Okay now things I am p-oed about:
[s] 1. When I type in this code for membership: I save it right? and compile(just in case), well after i do that i go onto my server, onto the account i am making a member, and it says for me: "You are a member, and an admin.", but at the top it says You are not a member, and when i try to equip member items it says that i need to be member, and when i go onto that player in the Characters folder, and click on me it goes back to this: :( I NEED HELP ON FIXING THIS PLZ DRIVIN' ME NUTS! [/s] [size=18pt]THATS ALL FIXED THX TO Bangali boy![/size]
2. I have edited and went through 2 times on editing the NPC talk in NPCHandler.java and after that i save, compile and have even restarted the Runserver.bat thing, when i go on the server it still says the Dialogue it has had before but i go into NPCHandler.java and everything is the same as it was, so I am confused! PLZ HELP
3. I have edited the starting outfit in Player.java, when I save compile, etc... i start a new acc, when i go on there is the original outfit, like i said things arent being transfered, its pissin' me off! But plz help :(
Thanks for taking your time for reading this! That's it for now, and ANY info would be greatly appreciated!
Thanks again, Axlnosbest1

item.title: Need more help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @axlnosbest1 axlnosbest1
item.description:
@axlnosbest1 wrote:

Thank you so much Bangali boy! the members.txt method did work thanks so much![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 08:33:12 pm[/size][hr]bump plz someone answer i g2g soon plz

Read full topic
item.source: Need more help on my server!

item.title: Need more help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Bangali_boy Bangali boy
item.description:
@Bangali_boy wrote:

Check one of the folders and see if there’s a .txt file named Members.
Add you name in there.
OR…
Either your saving is messed up (Mostly Czar).

Or, you can do this.
Change your Member rights to “4”.

If that dosen’t work, refresh your brower/client.
Then if that dosen’t work, take out Membership Czar way, and make Devolution way.

Read full topic
item.source: Need more help on my server!
